targets.rawSql:
WITH params AS
(
       SELECT COALESCE(To_timestamp($__to/1000), Now())                       AS to_ts,
              COALESCE(To_timestamp($__to/1000), Now()) - interval '1 months' as from_ts ),
-- Latest xcmRateLimit per asset (robust extraction; ignore rows without a numeric limit)
raw_limits AS
(
       SELECT
              CASE
                     WHEN (
                                   e.args->>'assetId') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->>'assetId')::int
              END AS asset_id, (
              CASE
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'xcmRateLimit') = 'number' THEN (e.args->'xcmRateLimit')::text::numeric(78,0)
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'xcmRateLimit') = 'string'
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->>'xcmRateLimit') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->>'xcmRateLimit')::numeric(78,0)
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'xcmRateLimit') = 'object'
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->'xcmRateLimit' ? 'Some')
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->'xcmRateLimit'->>'Some') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->'xcmRateLimit'->>'Some')::numeric(78,0)
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'assetParams') = 'object'
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->'assetParams'->>'xcmRateLimit') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->'assetParams'->>'xcmRateLimit')::numeric(78,0)
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'update') = 'object'
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->'update'->>'xcmRateLimit') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->'update'->>'xcmRateLimit')::numeric(78,0)
                     ELSE NULL
              END )       AS xcm_rate_limit,
              b.timestamp AS ts,
              b.id        AS blk
       FROM   event e
       JOIN   block b
       ON     b.id = e.block_id
       WHERE  e.NAME = 'AssetRegistry.Updated' ), limits AS
(
       SELECT asset_id,
              xcm_rate_limit
       FROM   (
                       SELECT   asset_id,
                                xcm_rate_limit,
                                ts,
                                row_number() OVER (partition BY asset_id ORDER BY ts DESC, blk DESC) AS rn
                       FROM     raw_limits
                       WHERE    asset_id IS NOT NULL
                       AND      xcm_rate_limit IS NOT NULL ) s
       WHERE  rn = 1 ),
-- Daily net mints in the last 3 months (Deposited - Withdrawn)
daily AS
(
         SELECT   date_trunc('day', b.timestamp) AS day_ts,
                  (e.args->>'currencyId')::int   AS asset_id,
                  sum(
                  CASE
                           WHEN e.NAME = 'Tokens.Deposited' THEN (e.args->>'amount'):: numeric
                           WHEN e.NAME = 'Tokens.Withdrawn' THEN -(e.args->>'amount')::numeric
                           ELSE 0
                  END ) AS net_deposits
         FROM     event e
         JOIN     block b
         ON       b.id = e.block_id
         JOIN     params p
         ON       true
         WHERE    e.NAME IN ('Tokens.Deposited',
                             'Tokens.Withdrawn')
         AND      (
                           e.args->>'currencyId') ~ '^\d+$'
         AND      b.timestamp >= p.from_ts
         AND      b.timestamp < p.to_ts
         GROUP BY 1,
                  2 ),
-- Winsorize per asset (p1–p99)
wins AS
(
       SELECT d.asset_id,
              d.day_ts,
              CASE
                     WHEN d.net_deposits < px.p1 THEN px.p1
                     WHEN d.net_deposits > px.p99 THEN px.p99
                     ELSE d.net_deposits
              END AS net_deposits_wins
       FROM   daily d
       JOIN
              (
                       SELECT   asset_id,
                                percentile_cont(0.01) within GROUP (ORDER BY net_deposits) AS p1,
                                percentile_cont(0.99) within GROUP (ORDER BY net_deposits) AS p99
                       FROM     daily
                       GROUP BY asset_id ) px
       using  (asset_id) ),
-- Max winsorized daily net mints per asset in window
per_asset AS
(
         SELECT   asset_id,
                  floor(max(net_deposits_wins))::numeric(78,0) AS max_daily_winsorized
         FROM     wins
         GROUP BY asset_id )
-- Final: include every asset that has a limit; show 0 for those with no activity in window
SELECT
  l.asset_id,
  COALESCE(pa.max_daily_winsorized, 0)::numeric(78,0) AS used,
  GREATEST(l.xcm_rate_limit - COALESCE(pa.max_daily_winsorized, 0), 0)::numeric(78,0) AS headroom,
  l.xcm_rate_limit                                    AS xcmratelimit,
  (COALESCE(pa.max_daily_winsorized, 0) / NULLIF(l.xcm_rate_limit, 0))::double precision AS ratio_01
FROM limits l
LEFT JOIN per_asset pa USING (asset_id)
ORDER BY asset_id;

WITH params AS
(
       SELECT COALESCE(To_timestamp($__to/1000), Now())                       AS to_ts,
              COALESCE(To_timestamp($__to/1000), Now()) - interval '1 months' as from_ts ),
-- Latest xcmRateLimit per asset (robust extraction; ignore rows without a numeric limit)
raw_limits AS
(
       SELECT
              CASE
                     WHEN (
                                   e.args->>'assetId') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->>'assetId')::int
              END AS asset_id, (
              CASE
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'xcmRateLimit') = 'number' THEN (e.args->'xcmRateLimit')::text::numeric(78,0)
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'xcmRateLimit') = 'string'
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->>'xcmRateLimit') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->>'xcmRateLimit')::numeric(78,0)
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'xcmRateLimit') = 'object'
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->'xcmRateLimit' ? 'Some')
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->'xcmRateLimit'->>'Some') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->'xcmRateLimit'->>'Some')::numeric(78,0)
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'assetParams') = 'object'
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->'assetParams'->>'xcmRateLimit') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->'assetParams'->>'xcmRateLimit')::numeric(78,0)
                     WHEN jsonb_typeof(e.args->'update') = 'object'
                     AND    (
                                   e.args->'update'->>'xcmRateLimit') ~ '^\d+$' THEN (e.args->'update'->>'xcmRateLimit')::numeric(78,0)
                     ELSE NULL
              END )       AS xcm_rate_limit,
              b.timestamp AS ts,
              b.id        AS blk
       FROM   event e
       JOIN   block b
       ON     b.id = e.block_id
       WHERE  e.NAME = 'AssetRegistry.Updated' ), limits AS
(
       SELECT asset_id,
              xcm_rate_limit
       FROM   (
                       SELECT   asset_id,
                                xcm_rate_limit,
                                ts,
                                row_number() OVER (partition BY asset_id ORDER BY ts DESC, blk DESC) AS rn
                       FROM     raw_limits
                       WHERE    asset_id IS NOT NULL
                       AND      xcm_rate_limit IS NOT NULL ) s
       WHERE  rn = 1 ),
-- Daily net mints in the last 3 months (Deposited - Withdrawn)
daily AS
(
         SELECT   date_trunc('day', b.timestamp) AS day_ts,
                  (e.args->>'currencyId')::int   AS asset_id,
                  sum(
                  CASE
                           WHEN e.NAME = 'Tokens.Deposited' THEN (e.args->>'amount'):: numeric
                           WHEN e.NAME = 'Tokens.Withdrawn' THEN -(e.args->>'amount')::numeric
                           ELSE 0
                  END ) AS net_deposits
         FROM     event e
         JOIN     block b
         ON       b.id = e.block_id
         JOIN     params p
         ON       true
         WHERE    e.NAME IN ('Tokens.Deposited',
                             'Tokens.Withdrawn')
         AND      (
                           e.args->>'currencyId') ~ '^\d+$'
         AND      b.timestamp >= p.from_ts
         AND      b.timestamp < p.to_ts
         GROUP BY 1,
                  2 ),
-- Winsorize per asset (p1–p99)
wins AS
(
       SELECT d.asset_id,
              d.day_ts,
              CASE
                     WHEN d.net_deposits < px.p1 THEN px.p1
                     WHEN d.net_deposits > px.p99 THEN px.p99
                     ELSE d.net_deposits
              END AS net_deposits_wins
       FROM   daily d
       JOIN
              (
                       SELECT   asset_id,
                                percentile_cont(0.01) within GROUP (ORDER BY net_deposits) AS p1,
                                percentile_cont(0.99) within GROUP (ORDER BY net_deposits) AS p99
                       FROM     daily
                       GROUP BY asset_id ) px
       using  (asset_id) ),
-- Max winsorized daily net mints per asset in window
per_asset AS
(
         SELECT   asset_id,
                  floor(max(net_deposits_wins))::numeric(78,0) AS max_daily_winsorized
         FROM     wins
         GROUP BY asset_id )
-- Final: include every asset that has a limit; show 0 for those with no activity in window
SELECT 
  l.asset_id::text AS asset_id,
  (COALESCE(pa.max_daily_winsorized, 0) / NULLIF(l.xcm_rate_limit, 0))::double precision AS ratio_01
FROM limits l
LEFT JOIN per_asset pa USING (asset_id)
ORDER BY l.asset_id;

panels.title: Max Mint Limit - Gauge Bar Chart
